testcase.classname: Check Competetia website login and forgot password functionality
testcase.name: Login Test for Referrer User
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Chrome browser............................................passed Then User Clicks on Login CTA from homepage.................................passed Then User enters Email id as "deulkar.prasad87@gmail.com" and password as "Password!21".passed Then User clicks on LoginCTA from pop-up....................................passed Then User navigates on Welcome page with page title as "Inner Circle : Dashboard".passed Then Referre dashboard should be displayed..................................passed Then User close the browser.................................................passed
